text: Hi guys. I have created a contact using HubSpot API and want to send a welcome email to this user. I am creating a workflow with contact enrolment trigger but I don't understand  how to set it up. All it asks me select some properties in enrolment triggers. Can anybody explain me how this trigger and enrolment  works?

The way a Workflow is "triggered" (to determine WHEN it runs) is done through those enrollment triggers. Right now it uses property changes. For example, if your goal was to send a welcome email to ALL contacts as soon as they're created, you could simply use a trigger like "Contact first name `is known`". This will enroll every Contact with a first name _after_ you enable the Workflow
I am creating a new app so all my contacts will be created 1 by 1 basis so just want to send email the registered user only.
